Oblivion
10 Apr 2013 by ben9985 on Love Coffee Movie Reviews lovecoffeemoviereviews.wordpress.com/2013/04/10/oblivion/
Tom Cruise, lots and lots and lots of Tom Cruise. If you don't really like Tom Cruise, you won't enjoy this Tom Cruise event. The plot is about space, mankind and the struggle for freedom - but really this movie is all about Tom Cruise.
